name: Sensei Moro
description: Gives the tutorial and main quests to new players.

name: Greedy Cey
description: Buys items from players.

name: Marbles
description: Buys weapons and armor from players.

name: Maria
description: Runs a potion shop.

name: Miner Fred
description: Runs a pickaxe shop.

name: Wizard
description: Allows players to reroll races.

name: Umut The Brave
description: Gives quests related to slaying enemies.

name: Nord
description: Gives quests related to mining.

name: Enhancer
description: Upgrades weapons and armor.

name: Runemaker
description: Applies runes to weapons and armor.

name: Tomo the Explorist
description: Wandering explorer, his quest is to find his cat Tomo Cat.

name: Bard
description: Plays music by the campfire. Gives a quest to unlock the gate to Fallen Angel's Cave.

name: Suspicious Fisher
description: Stares at the water and “definitely isn’t hiding anything”.

name: Undead
description: The Undead is secretly hiding in the Secret Cave where you can find the guitar.

name: Sensei Moro (FG)
description: Gives forging and mining quests to the player in Forgotten Kingdom.

name: Greedy Cey (FG)
description: Buys items from players in Forgotten Kingdom.

name: Skal
